news.title: Class XII Results Declared - Record Breaking Performance!
news.content: We are extremely proud to announce that our Class XII students have achieved an outstanding 98% pass rate with 15 students securing above 95% marks. This is our best performance in the last decade!

news.title: State Level Science Exhibition Winners
news.content: Our talented students have won the State Level Science Exhibition with their innovative renewable energy project. The team of 5 students from Class XI will now represent Rajasthan at the National level.

news.title: Admissions Open for Academic Year 2024-25
news.content: Admissions are now open for all classes from I to XI. Apply online through our website or download the printed form. Last date for admission: March 31, 2024.

news.title: School Achieves Top 10 Ranking in District
news.content: Shri Shyam Public School has been ranked among the top 10 schools in Banswara district based on academic performance, infrastructure, and overall development.

news.title: New Computer Lab Inauguration
news.content: Our state-of-the-art computer lab with 40 new computers and high-speed internet connectivity was inaugurated by the District Collector. The lab will enhance digital learning for all students.

events.title: Annual Sports Day 2024
events.description: Join us for our Annual Sports Day featuring inter-house competitions, athletics, cultural performances, and prize distribution. All parents and community members are cordially invited.

events.title: Science Exhibition & Project Fair
events.description: Students from Classes VI to XII will showcase their innovative science projects, experiments, and research work. Judging will be done by external experts.

events.title: Christmas Celebration
events.description: Celebrate the spirit of Christmas with carol singing, dance performances, drama presentations, and festive activities for all students.

events.title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
events.description: Important meeting to discuss student progress, academic performance, and future planning. All parents are requested to attend.

events.title: New Year Celebration & Cultural Program
events.description: Welcome the New Year 2025 with cultural performances, student presentations, and special guest performances.

faculty.name: Mrs. Sunita Sharma
faculty.description: Educational leadership and administration specialist with extensive experience in curriculum development and school management.

faculty.name: Mr. Rajesh Kumar
faculty.description: Mathematics department head with expertise in advanced mathematics and analytical thinking. Specializes in preparing students for competitive examinations.

faculty.name: Dr. Priya Singh
faculty.description: Research-oriented chemistry teacher focusing on practical applications and scientific methodology. Published researcher in chemistry education.

faculty.name: Mrs. Meera Gupta
faculty.description: Language specialist with focus on communication skills and literature appreciation. Conducts creative writing workshops for students.

faculty.name: Mr. Amit Verma
faculty.description: Technology educator specializing in programming, web development, and digital literacy. Trains students in latest programming languages.

faculty.name: Mrs. Sushila Yadav
faculty.description: Hindi language and literature expert with focus on cultural values and communication skills. Conducts poetry and story writing competitions.

faculty.name: Mr. Ramesh Patel
faculty.description: Social science educator with expertise in history and political science. Organizes educational trips and historical awareness programs.

faculty.name: Mrs. Kavita Jain
faculty.description: Primary education specialist with deep understanding of child psychology and development. Expert in activity-based learning methods.

achievements.title: State Science Exhibition - 1st Prize
achievements.description: Innovation in Renewable Energy project wins state-level competition

achievements.title: Mathematics Olympiad Success
achievements.description: 5 students qualified for National Level Mathematics Olympiad

achievements.title: District Sports Championship
achievements.description: Overall champions in inter-school sports competition

achievements.title: Best School Award - Regional
achievements.description: Recognized as best school in regional cultural competition

achievements.title: Academic Excellence Recognition
achievements.description: Ranked among Top 10 Schools in District for consistent performance

achievements.title: Green School Award
achievements.description: Environmental Conservation Initiative recognized at state level
